original: Dīgha Nikāya 11
analyzed: dīgha nikāya

original: Kevaṭṭasutta
analyzed: kevaṭṭa sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nāḷandāyaṁ viharati pāvārikambavane.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā nāḷandāyam viharati pāvārikamba vane

original: Atha kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: atha kho kevaṭṭaḥ gahapati puttaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho kevaṭṭaḥ gahapati puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ayaṁ, bhante, nāḷandā iddhā ceva phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā bhagavati abhippasannā.
analyzed: bhante nāḷandā iddhā ca iva phītā ca bahu janā ākiṇṇa manussā bhagavati abhippasannā

original: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samādisatu, yo uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati;
analyzed: sādhu bhante bhagavā ekam bhikkhum samādisatu yaḥ uttari manussa dhammā iddhi pāṭihāriyam karissati

original: evāyaṁ nāḷandā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissatī”ti.
analyzed: eva ayam nā āḷandā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā kevaṭṭaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavā kevaṭṭam gahapati puttam etat avoca

original: “na kho ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desemi:
analyzed: na kho aha kevaṭṭa bhikkhūnam evam dhammam desemi

original: ‘etha tumhe, bhikkhave, gihīnaṁ odātavasanānaṁ uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karothā’”ti.
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhave gihīnam odāta vasanānam uttari manussa dhammāḥ iddhi pāṭihāriyam karotha ati

original: Dutiyampi kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho kevaṭṭaḥ gahapati puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “nāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ dhaṁsemi;
analyzed: na aha bhante bhagavantam

original: api ca evaṁ vadāmi:
analyzed: api ca evam vadāmi

original: ‘ayaṁ, bhante, nāḷandā iddhā ceva phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā bhagavati abhippasannā.
analyzed: bhante nāḷandā iddhā ca iva phītā ca bahu janā ākiṇṇa manussā bhagavati abhippasannā

original: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samādisatu, yo uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati;
analyzed: sādhu bhante bhagavā ekam bhikkhum samādisatu yaḥ uttari manussa dhammā iddhi pāṭihāriyam karissati

original: evāyaṁ nāḷandā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissatī’”ti.
analyzed: eva ayam nā āḷandā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissati iti

original: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā kevaṭṭaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi khalu bhagavā kevaṭṭam gahapati puttam etat avoca

original: “na kho ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desemi:
analyzed: na kho aha kevaṭṭa bhikkhūnam evam dhammam desemi

original: ‘etha tumhe, bhikkhave, gihīnaṁ odātavasanānaṁ uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karothā’”ti.
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhave gihīnam odāta vasanānam uttari manussa dhammāḥ iddhi pāṭihāriyam karotha ati

original: Tatiyampi kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho kevaṭṭaḥ gahapati puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “nāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ dhaṁsemi;
analyzed: na aha bhante bhagavantam

original: api ca evaṁ vadāmi:
analyzed: api ca evam vadāmi

original: ‘ayaṁ, bhante, nāḷandā iddhā ceva phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā bhagavati abhippasannā.
analyzed: bhante nāḷandā iddhā ca iva phītā ca bahu janā ākiṇṇa manussā bhagavati abhippasannā

original: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samādisatu, yo uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati.
analyzed: sādhu bhante bhagavā ekam bhikkhum samādisatu yaḥ uttari manussa dhammā iddhi pāṭihāriyam karissati

original: Evāyaṁ nāḷandā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissatī’”ti.
analyzed: eva ayam nā āḷandā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissati iti

original: 1. Iddhipāṭihāriya
analyzed: iddhi pāṭihāriya

original: “Tīṇi kho imāni, kevaṭṭa, pāṭihāriyāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
analyzed: tīṇi kho imāni kevaṭṭa pāṭihāriyāni mayā sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni

original: Katamāni tīṇi?
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi

original: Iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ, ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṁ, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ.
analyzed: iddhi pāṭihāriya ādesanā pāṭihāriya anusāsanī pāṭihāriya

original: Katamañca, kevaṭṭa, iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca kevaṭṭaḥ iddhi pāṭihāriya

original: Idha, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā
analyzed: idha kevaṭṭa bhikkhu aneka vihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā

original: hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti; āvibhāvaṁ tirobhāvaṁ tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ
analyzed: hoti bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ hoti āvi bhāvam tirobhāvam tiro kuṭṭam tiro pākāram tiro pabbata

original: asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse; pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti seyyathāpi
analyzed: a sajjamānaḥ gacchati sā iyathā api ākāse pathaviyā api ummujja nimujjam karoti sā iyathā api

original: udake; udakepi abhijjamāne gacchati seyyathāpi pathaviyaṁ; ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati
analyzed: udake udake pi abhijjamāne gacchati seyyathā api pathaviye ākāse pi pallaṅkena kamati

original: seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo; imepi candimasūriye evaṁ mahiddhike evaṁ mahānubhāve pāṇinā
analyzed: seyyathā api pakkhī sakuṇaḥ ime api candima sūriye evam mahiddhike evam mahā anubhāve pāṇinā

original: parāmasati parimajjati; yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti.
analyzed: parāmasati parimajjati yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatta iti

original: Tamenaṁ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṁ bhikkhuṁ anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhontaṁ—ekopi
analyzed: tam enam aññataraḥ saddhaḥ pasannaḥ passati tam bhikkhum aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhonta ekaḥ api

original: hutvā bahudhā hontaṁ, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontaṁ; āvibhāvaṁ tirobhāvaṁ; tirokuṭṭaṁ
analyzed: hutvā bahudhā honta bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ honta āvi bhāvam tirobhāva tirokuṭṭa

original: tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamānaṁ gacchantaṁ seyyathāpi ākāse; pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṁ
analyzed: tiro upākāram tiro pabbatam a sajjamānam gacchantam seyyathā api ākāse pathaviyā api ummujja nimujja

original: karontaṁ seyyathāpi udake; udakepi abhijjamāne gacchantaṁ seyyathāpi pathaviyaṁ;
analyzed: karontam sā iyathā api udake udake pi abhijjamāne gacchantam sā iyathā api

original: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamantaṁ seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo; imepi candimasūriye evaṁ mahiddhike
analyzed: ākāse pi pallaṅkena kamantam seyyathā api pakkhī sakuṇaḥ ime pi candima sūriye evam mahiddhike

original: evaṁ mahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasantaṁ parimajjantaṁ yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattentaṁ.
analyzed: evam mahā anubhāve pāṇinā parāmasantam parimajjantam yāva brahma lokāḥ api kāyena vasam

original: Tamenaṁ so saddho pasanno aññatarassa assaddhassa appasannassa āroceti:
analyzed: tam enam saḥ saddhaḥ pasannaḥ aññatarassa assaddhassa appasannassa āroceti

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, samaṇassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho samaṇassa mahiddhika tā mahā anubhāva tā

original: Amāhaṁ bhikkhuṁ addasaṁ anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhontaṁ—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṁ, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontaṁ …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattentan’ti.
analyzed: amā aham bhikkhum addasam aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhonta ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā honta bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ hontam pe yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam

original: Tamenaṁ so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam evam vadeyya

original: ‘atthi kho, bho, gandhārī nāma vijjā.
analyzed: atthi kho bho gandhārī nāma vijjā

original: Tāya so bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattetī’ti.
analyzed: tāya saḥ bhikkhu aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhoti ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ hoti pe yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatteti iti

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kevaṭṭa,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kevaṭṭa

original: api nu so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam evam vadeyyāti

original: “Vadeyya, bhante”ti.
analyzed: vadeyya bhanta iti

original: “Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, iddhipāṭihāriye ādīnavaṁ sampassamāno iddhipāṭihāriyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi.
analyzed: imam kho aha kevaṭṭaḥ iddhi pāṭihāriye ādīnavam sampassamānaḥ iddhi pāṭihāriyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi

original: 2. Ādesanāpāṭihāriya
analyzed: ādesanā pāṭihāriya

original: Katamañca, kevaṭṭa, ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca kevaṭṭaḥ ādesanā pāṭihāriya

original: Idha, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisati, cetasikampi ādisati, vitakkitampi ādisati, vicāritampi ādisati:
analyzed: idha kevaṭṭa bhikkhu para sattānam para puggalānam cittam api ādisati cetasikam api ādisati vitakkitam api ādisati vicāritam api ādisati

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: Tamenaṁ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṁ bhikkhuṁ parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisantaṁ, cetasikampi ādisantaṁ, vitakkitampi ādisantaṁ, vicāritampi ādisantaṁ:
analyzed: tam enam aññataraḥ saddhaḥ pasannaḥ passati tam bhikkhum para sattānam para puggalānam cittam api ādisanta cetasikam api ādisanta vitakkitam api ādisanta vicāritam api ādisanta

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: Tamenaṁ so saddho pasanno aññatarassa assaddhassa appasannassa āroceti:
analyzed: tam enam saḥ saddhaḥ pasannaḥ aññatarassa assaddhassa appasannassa āroceti

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, samaṇassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho samaṇassa mahiddhika tā mahā anubhāva tā

original: Amāhaṁ bhikkhuṁ addasaṁ parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisantaṁ, cetasikampi ādisantaṁ, vitakkitampi ādisantaṁ, vicāritampi ādisantaṁ:
analyzed: amā aham bhikkhum addasam para sattānam para puggalānam cittam pi ādisanta cetasikam pi ādisanta vitakkitam pi ādisanta vicāritam pi ādisanta

original: “evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan”’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: Tamenaṁ so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam evam vadeyya

original: ‘atthi kho, bho, maṇikā nāma vijjā;
analyzed: atthi kho bho maṇikā nāma vijjā

original: tāya so bhikkhu parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisati, cetasikampi ādisati, vitakkitampi ādisati, vicāritampi ādisati:
analyzed: tāya saḥ bhikkhu para sattānam para puggalānam cittam api ādisati cetasikam api ādisati vitakkitam api ādisati vicāritam api ādisati

original: “evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan”’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kevaṭṭa,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kevaṭṭa

original: api nu so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam evam vadeyyāti

original: “Vadeyya, bhante”ti.
analyzed: vadeyya bhanta iti

original: “Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, ādesanāpāṭihāriye ādīnavaṁ sampassamāno ādesanāpāṭihāriyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi.
analyzed: imam kho aha kevaṭṭaḥ ādesanā pāṭihāriye ādīnavam sampassamānaḥ ādesanā pāṭihāriyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi

original: 3. Anusāsanīpāṭihāriya
analyzed: anusāsanīpāṭihāriya

original: Katamañca, kevaṭṭa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca kevaṭṭa anusāsanī pāṭihāriya

original: Idha, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu evamanusāsati:
analyzed: idha kevaṭṭa bhikkhu evam anusāsati

original: ‘evaṁ vitakketha, mā evaṁ vitakkayittha, evaṁ manasikarotha, mā evaṁ manasākattha, idaṁ pajahatha, idaṁ upasampajja viharathā’ti.
analyzed: evam vitakketha mā evam vitakkayittha evam manasikarotha mā evam manasā akattha idam pajahatha idam upasampajja viharatha ati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, kevaṭṭa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati kevaṭṭa anusāsanīpāṭihāriya

original: Puna caparaṁ, kevaṭṭa, idha tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho …pe…
analyzed: puna capara kevaṭṭa idha tathāgataḥ loke uppajjati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ pe

original: Evaṁ kho, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti …pe…
analyzed: evam kho kevaṭṭa bhikkhu sīla sampannaḥ hoti pe

original: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idampi vuccati, kevaṭṭa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idam pi vuccati kevaṭṭa anusāsanī pāṭihāriyam pe

original: dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam jhānam

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idampi vuccati, kevaṭṭa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idam pi vuccati kevaṭṭa anusāsanī pāṭihāriyam pe

original: ñāṇadassanāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti …pe…
analyzed: ñāṇa dassanāya cittam abhinīharati abhininnāma iti pe

original: idampi vuccati, kevaṭṭa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idam pi vuccati kevaṭṭa anusāsanī pāṭihāriyam pe

original: nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāti …pe…
analyzed: na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti pe

original: idampi vuccati, kevaṭṭa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ.
analyzed: idam pi vuccati kevaṭṭa anusāsanī pāṭihāriya

original: Imāni kho, kevaṭṭa, tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
analyzed: imāni kho kevaṭṭa tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni mayā sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni

original: 4. Bhūtanirodhesakabhikkhuvatthu
analyzed: bhūta nirodha īsaka bhikkhu vatthu

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, kevaṭṭa, imasmiññeva bhikkhusaṅghe aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: bhūta pubba kevaṭṭa imasmin ñeva bhikkhu saṅghe aññatarassa bhikkhuno evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: ‘kattha nu kho ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti?
analyzed: kattha nu kho ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu tathārūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpajji, yathāsamāhite citte devayāniyo maggo pāturahosi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ kevaṭṭa bhikkhu tathārūpam samādhim samāpajji yathā samāhite citte devayāniyaḥ maggaḥ pāturahosi

original: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu yena cātumahārājikā devā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā cātumahārājike deve etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho saḥ kevaṭṭa bhikkhu yena cātumahārājikā devā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā cātumahārājike deve etat avoca

original: ‘kattha nu kho, āvuso, ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti?
analyzed: kattha nu kho āvuso ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, cātumahārājikā devā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte kevaṭṭa cātumahārājikāḥ devāḥ tam bhikkhum etat avocuḥ

original: ‘mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jānāma:
analyzed: mayam pi kho bhikkhu na jānāma

original: “yatthime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”ti.
analyzed: yatthime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, cattāro mahārājāno amhehi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
analyzed: atthi kho bhikkhu cattāraḥ mahārājānaḥ amhehi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca

original: Te kho etaṁ jāneyyuṁ:

original: “yatthime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”’ti.

original: ‘kattha nu kho, āvuso, ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti?

analyzed: yatthime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī

original: “yatthime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”’ti.
analyzed: yatthime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

analyzed: kaham pana avuso etarahi saḥ mahā brahmā ati

original: api ca, bhikkhu, yathā nimittā dissanti, āloko sañjāyati, obhāso pātubhavati, brahmā
analyzed: api ca bhikkhu yathā nimittā dissanti ālokaḥ sañjāyati obhāsaḥ pātubhavati brahmā

original: obhāso pātubhavatī’ti.

original: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, mahābrahmā nacirasseva pāturahosi.

analyzed: aham asmi bhikkhu brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūtaḥ añña datthudasaḥ vasa vattī issaraḥ kattā nimmātā seṭṭhaḥ sa jitā vasī pitā

original: Dutiyampi kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu taṁ mahābrahmānaṁ etadavoca:

original: ‘na khohaṁ taṁ, āvuso, evaṁ pucchāmi:

analyzed: kattha nu kho āvuso ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

analyzed: dutiyam pi kho saḥ kevaṭṭa mahābrahmā tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: ‘ahamasmi, bhikkhu, brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānan’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi bhikkhu brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūtaḥ añña datthudasaḥ vasa vattī issaraḥ kattā nimmātā seṭṭhaḥ sa jitā vasī pitā

original: Tatiyampi kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu taṁ mahābrahmānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho saḥ kevaṭṭa bhikkhu tam mahābrahmānam etat avoca

original: ‘na khohaṁ taṁ, āvuso, evaṁ pucchāmi:
analyzed: na kha uham te āvuso evam pucchāmi

original: “tvamasi brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānan”ti.
analyzed: tvam asi brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūtaḥ vasavattī issaraḥ kattā nimmātā seṭṭhaḥ sajitā vasī pitā

original: Evañca kho ahaṁ taṁ, āvuso, pucchāmi:
analyzed: evam ca kho aham te āvuso pucchāmi

original: “kattha nu kho, āvuso, ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”’ti?
analyzed: kattha nu kho āvuso ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, mahābrahmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ apanetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho saḥ kevaṭṭa mahābrahmā tam bhikkhum bāhāyam gahetvā eka mantam apanetvā tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: ‘ime kho maṁ, bhikkhu, brahmakāyikā devā evaṁ jānanti, “natthi kiñci brahmuno aññātaṁ,
analyzed: ime kho ma bhikkhu brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ evam jānanti natthi kiñci brahmunaḥ

original: natthi kiñci brahmuno adiṭṭhaṁ, natthi kiñci brahmuno aviditaṁ, natthi kiñci brahmuno asacchikatan”ti.
analyzed: natthi kiñci brahmuno natthi kiñci brahmuno a vidita natthi kiñci brahmuno

original: Tasmāhaṁ tesaṁ sammukhā na byākāsiṁ.
analyzed: tasmā aham tesam sammukhā na

original: Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na jānāmi yatthime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti.
analyzed: aham pi kho bhikkhu na jānāmi yattha ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhu, tuyhevetaṁ dukkaṭaṁ, tuyhevetaṁ aparaddhaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ atidhāvitvā bahiddhā pariyeṭṭhiṁ āpajjasi imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya.
analyzed: tasmā atiha bhikkhu tuyhā iva etam dukkaṭa tuyhā iva etam aparaddha yam tvam tam bhagavantam atidhāvitvā bahiddhā pariyeṭṭhim āpajjasi imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya

original: Gaccha tvaṁ, bhikkhu, tameva bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā imaṁ pañhaṁ puccha, yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti, tathā naṁ dhāreyyāsī’ti.
analyzed: gaccha tva bhikkhu tam eva bhagavantam upasaṅkamitvā imam pañham puccha yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā nam dhāreyyāsi iti

original: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evameva brahmaloke antarahito mama purato pāturahosi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ kevaṭṭa bhikkhu seyyathā api nāma balavā purisaḥ samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya evam eva brahma loke antarahitaḥ mama puratas pātuḥ ahosi

original: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi, ekamantaṁ nisinno kho, kevaṭṭa, so bhikkhu maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho saḥ kevaṭṭa bhikkhu mam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho kevaṭṭa saḥ bhikkhu mam etat avoca

original: ‘kattha nu kho, bhante, ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti?
analyzed: kattha nu kho bhante ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: 4.1. Tīradassisakuṇupamā
analyzed: tīra dassi sakuṇupamā

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocaṁ—
analyzed: evam vutte aha kevaṭṭa tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhu, sāmuddikā vāṇijā tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ gahetvā nāvāya samuddaṁ ajjhogāhanti.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhu sāmuddikāḥ vāṇijāḥ tīra dassim sakuṇam gahetvā nāvāya samuddaṃ ajjhogāhanti

original: Te atīradakkhiniyā nāvāya tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ muñcanti.
analyzed: te a tīra dakkhiniyā nāvāya tīra dassim sakuṇam muñcanti

original: So gacchateva puratthimaṁ disaṁ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ, gacchati pacchimaṁ disaṁ, gacchati uttaraṁ disaṁ, gacchati uddhaṁ disaṁ, gacchati anudisaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ gacchatā iva puratthimam disa gacchati dakkhiṇam disa gacchati pacchimam disa gacchati uttaram disa gacchati uddham disa gacchati anudisa

original: Sace so samantā tīraṁ passati, tathāgatakova hoti.
analyzed: sace so samantā tīram passati tathāgatakaḥ uva hoti

original: Sace pana so samantā tīraṁ na passati, tameva nāvaṁ paccāgacchati.
analyzed: sace pana so samantā tīram na passati tam eva nāvam paccāgacchati

original: Evameva kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, yato yāva brahmalokā pariyesamāno imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇaṁ nājjhagā, atha mamaññeva santike paccāgato.
analyzed: evam eva kho tva bhikkhu yatas yāva brahmalokā pariyesamāno imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇam na ajjhagāḥ atha mamaññā iva santike paccāgataḥ

original: Na kho eso, bhikkhu, pañho evaṁ pucchitabbo:
analyzed: na kho eso bhikkhu pañhaḥ evam pucchitabbaḥ

original: ‘kattha nu kho, bhante, ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti, seyyathidaṁ—pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti?
analyzed: kattha nu kho bhante ime cattāraḥ mahābhūtāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti seyyathida pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Evañca kho eso, bhikkhu, pañho pucchitabbo:
analyzed: evam ca kho eso bhikkhu pañhaḥ pucchitabbo

original: ‘Kattha āpo ca pathavī,
analyzed: katthaḥ āpaḥ ca pathavī

original: tejo vāyo na gādhati;
analyzed: tejaḥ vāyo na gādhati

original: Kattha dīghañca rassañca,
analyzed: kattha dīghan ca rassan ca

original: aṇuṁ thūlaṁ subhāsubhaṁ;
analyzed: aṇum thūlam subha asubha

original: Kattha nāmañca rūpañca,
analyzed: kattha nāmañca rūpañca

original: asesaṁ uparujjhatī’ti.
analyzed: asesam uparujjhati iti

original: Tatra veyyākaraṇaṁ bhavati:
analyzed: tatra veyyākaraṇam bhavati

original: ‘Viññāṇaṁ anidassanaṁ,
analyzed: viññāṇam anidassana

original: anantaṁ sabbatopabhaṁ;
analyzed: anantam sabbata upabha

original: Ettha āpo ca pathavī,
analyzed: ettha āpaḥ ca pathavī

original: tejo vāyo na gādhati.
analyzed: tejaḥ vāyo na gādhati

original: Ettha dīghañca rassañca,
analyzed: ettha dīghañ ca rassañ ca

original: aṇuṁ thūlaṁ subhāsubhaṁ;
analyzed: aṇum thūlam subha asubha

original: Ettha nāmañca rūpañca,
analyzed: ettha nāman ca rūpañca

original: asesaṁ uparujjhati;
analyzed: asesam uparujjhati

original: Viññāṇassa nirodhena,
analyzed: viññāṇassa nirodhena

original: etthetaṁ uparujjhatī’”ti.
analyzed: ettha itam uparujjhati iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ kevaṭṭaḥ gahapati putto bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Kevaṭṭasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ ekādasamaṁ.
analyzed: kevaṭṭa suttam niṭṭhitam ekādasama
